column2: By reason of the aforesaid behaviour you have conducted yourself in a manner
which would be regarded as disgraceful, or dishonourable of Attorneys-at-Law
of good repute and competency and have thus committed a breach of Rule No.
60 of the Supreme Court Rules (Conduct of and Etiquette for Attorneys-at-Law)
of 1988 made under Article 136 of the Constitution of the Democratic Socialist
By reason of the aforesaid acts and conduct, you have conducted yourself in a
manner  that  would  render  yourself  unfit  to  remain  an  Attorney-at-Law  and
have thus committed a breach of Rule 60 of the said Rules;
By reason of the aforesaid acts and conduct, you have conducted yourself in a

fellows in the profession and have thus committed a breach of Rule 60 of the
